name: Plugin School
body:
# Plugin School



## **Chapter 1**
### Plugin.yml

Want to make a plugin so let start with plugin.yml first you need to make a file called plugin.yml when done open it with a editor (I will suggest Notpad++ or NetBean) and put these codes:

`
name: Plugin Name
`

`
author: Your Name
`

`
api: The New Api
`

`
version: Any version
`

`
main: Something\Something
`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
